title: DividendAmountTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify whether the dividend is paid with respect to the Dividend Period.

oneOf.title: AsSpecifiedInMasterConfirmation
oneOf.description: The Amount is determined as provided in the relevant Master Confirmation.

oneOf.title: ExAmount
oneOf.description: The ex-date for a dividend occurs during a dividend period.

oneOf.title: PaidAmount
oneOf.description: The payment date for a dividend occurs during a dividend period.

oneOf.title: RecordAmount
oneOf.description: The record date for a dividend occurs during a dividend period.
